title: Eccentric Hobby
original_name: エキセントリックホビー
sinopse:
One day, high school student Nagakura receives a love letter. Heading to the promised tree, the one who was waiting for him is Nishioka...dressed in a sailor girl uniform!

Super eccentric "campus love" comedy in a 4-panel comics!

(Source: Shinmakoku Scanlations)
